plot: 'Tonight we present something marvelous'. In doing so, we tell the poetic stories of the women of Dulce Palabras. Stories of urban life, inter-generational connections, poetry of the people...
title: Palabras Dulces, Palabras Amargas
plot_es: 'Tonight we present something marvelous'. In doing so, we tell the poetic stories of the women of Dulce Palabras. Stories of urban life, inter-generational connections, poetry of the people...
